mapper.insert: insert into achievement (project_id, `value`, provenance, issuing_time, issuing_name, gmt_create, gmt_modified) values (#{projectId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{value,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{provenance,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{issuingTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{issuingName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update achievement set project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, `value` = #{value,jdbcType=INTEGER}, provenance = #{provenance,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, issuing_time = #{issuingTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, issuing_name = #{issuingName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, project_id, `value`, provenance, issuing_time, issuing_name, gmt_create, gmt_modified from achievement where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select id, project_id, `value`, provenance, issuing_time, issuing_name, gmt_create, gmt_modified from achievement
select id, project_id, `value`, provenance, issuing_time, issuing_name, gmt_create, gmt_modified from achievement where project_id = #{id}
